sprint_goal:
High-level goals: 
1. Jira Releases report 
2. CI/CD stages and steps filters support
3. ADO pipeline - release and environment support
4. GitHub Actions - initial discussion & research
5. Trellis and raw stats - related enhancements - 
    a. Add more date intervals for viewing the trellis scores
    b. Fix the collection calculation to be the total and not the average
6. Jira marketplace app - continuation
7. Jira snapshotting approach/design 
8. SEI on Harness platform - E2E local 
9. Program Progress report for Jira

High-level goals:

1. Jira releases as a widget along with lead time by time spent in stages
2. Testrail custom fields, aggs and stacks completion + stabilization
3. CI/CD step + stages available on CFR and DF - all integrations E2E
4. Support dynamic pipeline selection across all 4 DORA widgets
5. Trellis and raw stats related enhancements - 
a. Add more date intervals for viewing the trellis scores. 
b. Display the time the report was last calculated. 
6. Demo dashboard improvisation
7. Jira marketplace app
8. Jira snapshotting approach/design
9. Rockwell automation - SCM to CI/CD correlation fixes
10. SEI on Harness platform - E2E local 

Extended activities:
1. Resolve sprint metrics related issues
2. Customer escalations 
3. Support for POC/ POV customers
4. Program progress report for Jira
